comment: We needed to finish up early this day, so we bought 4lbs of amber syrup rather than make homemade, and went straight to 155F when we struck the mash. The Saaz also all turned out  to be pretty low alpha (3%), so it's going to be a little sweet, as well. (Although Brewtoad predicts 1.019 FG, which is not going to happen -- we'll get it down to 1.012 - 1.014, at least, so it'll be a little drier and pack a little more punch than the projected 7.9% ABV.)
